name: Half-Red Dragon Veteran
movement: 30 feet walking speed, can reposition without opportunity attacks
description: A humanoid warrior with draconic features, armored and wielding a longsword and shortsword, breathing fire.
memorable: The veteran combines martial combat skills with a powerful breath weapon, making it a versatile adversary.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using strength and tactical positioning.
relations: Related to other draconic creatures; may command lesser dragons or dragon-like beings.
environment: Common in combat zones or regions associated with dragons.
strengths: High melee attack bonuses, fire resistance, effective breath weapon.
weaknesses: Average dexterity and wisdom reduce effectiveness in certain situations.
attacks: Utilizes a longsword for slashing damage, a shortsword for piercing damage, and a heavy crossbow for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, a powerful area-of-effect attack that deals substantial fire damage.
equipment: Longsword, shortsword, and a heavy crossbow.
senses: Blindsight out to 10 feet allows it to sense nearby creatures even in darkness.
skills: Proficient in athletics for strong physical prowess and intimidation, along with basic perception.
additional_information: Gains advantage while making melee attacks due to tactical movement.
Can retaliate against missed melee attacks with off-hand counter.
Each turn after its breath attack, enemies can suffer ongoing fire damage if not extinguished.
Good saving throws against physical threats.
Strategically utilizes movement to avoid being flanked.
test_queries: combat veteran with area fire damage
